name: Irish People Vs Beer Moles
description:
The Beer Moles Have Stolen All Our Beer And Have Turned Cabbages Against Us. We Beeriously Need Your Help!!

Choose to Play as 'LeatherJacketGuy' , 'JohnnyBS' or 'LeviJeans' and Race through Levels of Flying Cabbages, Insane Beer Moles to SAVE OUR BEER!!

Roll, Jump and Defy Gravity to Avoid Obstacles in this Crazy New 'AreYaHavingThat' Game.

FEATURES:

- 5 different levels
- Easy to control movement
- Pick your favorite character from YouTube Show - 'AreYaHavingThat'
- Challenge yourself.

AreYaHavingThat Beer Mole Game is the first step in future game development for the 'AreYaHavingThat' Show on YouTube. Please support the release and help us develop it more. Have fun!

Visit Website - http://youtube.com/AreYaHavingThat
